about_the_game:
Get ready for a wild ride in this racing war machine simulator. Ram, shoot, flip your opponents over and wreck them all before the race ends, or get first to the finish line. You are sitting inside inside a 4 ton charriot of death, so jokes aside - go and unleash hell.

GAMEPLAY

Rush through dystopian wastelands, freezing glaciers, hot sands of the Sahara desert and picturesque islands. Use the weapons you have collected and avoid traps. Send your opponents to the junkyard using the right moment to attack - reflexes count! Lay mines, drop bombs, shoot mortars or rockets. Wield a variety of crazy weapons, such as the scrap blaster to push your opponents into the abyss, or rush straight to the finish line. In this tactical racing game, the decision of how you want to win depends solely on you!

TACTICAL RACING GAME

Reflexes, nerves of steel and the ability to plan tactically is the core of Turbo Bullets gameplay - a tactical racer. Will the decision to start in the tournament turn out to be right one and will you survive? - You gonna find out soon.

STORY

They call you Driver because you are the fastest in the market.

"They" call you when there is need for the best driver for a fishy job.

One day, you get caught in a police ambush. You receive an offer you cannot refuse - the prosecutor will withdraw the charges if you become a police plug.

You will infiltrate a criminal group and find out who is responsible for organizing the dangerous race known as the "Deadly Tournament"

"LETHAL TOURNAMENT"

Taking place in the shadow of shady dealings, illegal races without rules. Arm yourself and race to the finish line, or finish off all your opponents! In this race, everyone and everything wants to kill you! Armed to the teeth police will also want to get you - you are operating under cover, so they do not know that you are on their side. Win races, duels and climb your career to buy faster and more powerful cars. Tune your ride and acquire modern weapons and use them to scrap your opponents! Watch out for the ubiquitous turrets and traps, or use the map elements to gain advantage! In these crazy races, tactics and planning play a key role!

ULTRA FAST PACED RACING WITHOUT A MOMENT TO CATCH A BREATH

During Turbo Bullets races, everything happens in the blink of an eye. You'd better start practicing holding your breath, because you won't catch it again until you cross the finish line. Train you reflexes and master the controls. You will need to activate various weapons at once to survive in this uncompromising race. Are you bold enough to try ?

MAPS AND MODES

Turbo Bullets is all about racing. Take a part in quick and dynamic PvE, PvP or PvE&P matches. Each match ( race ) lasts 2-3 minutes, but during this time game won't let you go. Are you looking for some entertainment during school break or you only have a few space minutes waiting for the bus - doesn't matter, we have prepared something for ya.

Early Access version features:

* 5 diverse maps - races take place around the world. Rush through wasteland deserts, freezing glaciers, toxic countryside, city construction sites and breathtaking islands.

* Special "Quick race" mode

* Single player game mode with armory - pick your arms for race and send 'em to the junkyard!

* Local multiplayer splitscreen - up do 4 players.

A UNIQUE EXPERIENCE EVERY TIME

Collect funds to buy faster and more destructive cars, use the money wisely in the armory to create your own best weapon combinations that will allow you to wipe your opponents off the map

WEAPONS

Machine Gun

Your best friend, you can always rely on. Use it to turn your opponents into Swiss cheese and send them straight to the scrapyard

Homing missle Launcher

Use the limited ammunition of this powerful weapon to tear your opponents to shreds. Wait for the right moment and unleash destruction

Mortar Launcher

This ancient but deadly weapon deals massive area damage. An accurate hit with a mortar burst will turn even the toughest opponent into a burning pile.

Bomb

Spawn a bomb directly behind your vehicle and watch in the rearview camera as this powerful weapon sweeps your opponents off the track like a giant bowling ball

Landmine

Use this limited weapon to destroy your opponents with precision. A properly placed mine can turn itself into an invisible weapon and send the enemy to the scrapheap of history

More weaponry coming soon ( both offensive and defensive type ! )

name: Turbo Bullets

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 / Intel i7
  • Memory: 16000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050Ti 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 / Intel i7
  • Memory: 32000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6000 MB available space

short_description: Get ready for a wild ride in this exciting battle car racing simulator inspired by Death Race movie. Ram, shoot, flip your foes over, wreck them before the race ends, or get first to the finish line. You sit inside a 4 ton charriot of death, so jokes aside - go and unleash hell.
